Class Statistic

java.lang.Object
Statistic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Statistic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class representing statistical data for the Reversi game
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kai Uerlichs
